A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I gave it 1/2 becoz the movie has great visuals\,sound and action.Unfortunately that's about it.As someone who grew with SW\,it is not just a movie\,its has become part of our culture with a very special place in my heart.The filmmakers clearly destroyed it by including hidden agendas and insulting the main characters and the whole arc.Not to mention bizarre storyline with idiotic subplot.I understand the whole new gen\,girl power move on thing.But by not giving the proper burial to the legendary characters\,I'm afraid the Jedi ghost of the past will haunt us forever.
